managing your personal budgets

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-banner', templateUrl: './banner.component.html', styleUrls: ['./banner.component.css'] }) export class BannerComponent { imgLeft: String = 'assets/images/featureLeft.png'; imgIcon:any[] = [ 'assets/images/fastperform.png', 'assets/images/prototype.png', 'assets/images/vector3.png', ] imgArray : any[] = [ 'assets/images/banner1.png', 'assets/images/anubis.png', 'assets/images/maniac.png', 'assets/images/express.png', 'assets/images/banner1.png' ] title:any[] = ['Fast Performance' , 'Prototyping','Vector Editing'] }
